modName: Riverwood Falls Lodge by Brendan62 updated
summary: Medium Sized Cabin between Riverwood and Whiterun
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-5.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/10243-1-1430138382.png[/img]


UPDATED TO 1.1 Navmesh fixes and minor changes

**This file is exclusive to Nexus and Skyrim Real Estate,any other hosting requires my permission**

**Please note this is only reasonably lore friendly so LORE junkies complaints will not be tolerated and will be reported****

**After a lesson in patience this is finally uploaded and all sorted and the failed upload files removed**

Anyone who has a ctd with this try saving just before u enter then reloading that save.

THE MOD IS CLEAN AND HAS NO ISSUES IN MY GAME AT ALL

Note if you fast travel or enter cells 3 or 4 times Skyrim will crash when entered a not before entered cell this is game issue. Crashes are also caused when entering a cell with a lot of custom objects in it. This a game memory issue.

Remember that Skyrim is a buggy game its impossible to make a mod that works for everyone as all your pcs games are different

Description
===========
This is a medium sized lodge located between Riverwood and Whiterun features Weapons Room, Guest rooms, Alchemy Room, lots of safe storage,
Kitchen & staff rooms. Pet Dog
Bath all nicely furnished and includes your own personal maid, worker and Guest
All 3 can be companions and can be married. Note they are all high level.
Nice view from balcony, nice gardens, 1 Horse, Outdoor workshop with all cons Forge, tanning racks etc
This is themed more so for a mage character who is into nature so dont complain about a lack of weapon racks etc the are a few around the house just no wall ones
Note some high level items around the place if you dont like that dont pick them up.
The NPCs are all high level if you dont like that dont get them to follow you.

Bugs
====
The usual Skyrim navmesh etc bugs.
========

Details
=======
Just head towards Riverwood from Whiterun you will see it across the river
It's free, all you need to do is enter the front door

Credits
1, Little Baron for art frame mesh
2, Blary for the kind use of numerous meshes
3, Clintster74 for the deerskin & one rug
4, MJY for the great grandfather clock and statues
5, hissssa for the pet dog

***Extra thanks to Mellowtraumatic for uploading this for after 15 failed attempts by me**
***For those that dont want the female fantasy art there is a zip file called "non female fantasy artextracttodataandoverwrite"
Unzip in and overwite the original textures in my textures/Brendan/Art2 folder

Anyone who has used my mods before know they are very detailed and need a good pc to run them.
This file is exclusive to Nexus and Skyrim Real Estate,any other hosting requires my permission
Any Issues please post them in this topic on SKYRE
http://www.skyrimrealestate.com/forum/index.php?topic=102.0

***This is will not work with "Riverside Lodge" They are in the same place****
author: Brendan62
